Description: Array of :ref:`owinspaddrcomp`, where each item represents a classification of components of the address, such as municipality, postal code, etc.
Normalised address as returned by the BAG42 geocoding API [#bag42geo]_.
Name of the city or village this branch is located.
Street name and number of the address of this branch.
Zip code of the address of this branch. A Dutch zip code consists of four digits, a space and two letters (*1234 AB*) [#zipcodes]_. For normalisation purposes, the whitespace is removed.
Latitude/longitude coordinates of the viewport for this address
